db:abstract.db:para: The QAccessibleTableInterface class implements support for the IAccessibleTable2 interface.

db:section.db:title: [virtual noexcept] QAccessibleTableInterface::~QAccessibleTableInterface()
db:section.db:para: Destroys the QAccessibleTableInterface.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] QAccessibleInterface *QAccessibleTableInterface::caption() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the caption for the table.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] QAccessibleInterface *QAccessibleTableInterface::cellAt(int row, int column) const
db:section.db:para: Returns the cell at the specified row and column in the table.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] int QAccessibleTableInterface::columnCount() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the total number of columns in table.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] QString QAccessibleTableInterface::columnDescription(int column) const
db:section.db:para: Returns the description text of the specified column in the table.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] bool QAccessibleTableInterface::isColumnSelected(int column) const
db:section.db:para: Returns a boolean value indicating whether the specified column is completely selected.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] bool QAccessibleTableInterface::isRowSelected(int row) const
db:section.db:para: Returns a boolean value indicating whether the specified row is completely selected.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] void QAccessibleTableInterface::modelChange(QAccessibleTableModelChangeEvent *event)
db:section.db:para: Informs about a change in the model's layout. The event contains the details.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] int QAccessibleTableInterface::rowCount() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the total number of rows in table.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] QString QAccessibleTableInterface::rowDescription(int row) const
db:section.db:para: Returns the description text of the specified row in the table.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] bool QAccessibleTableInterface::selectColumn(int column)
db:section.db:para: Selects column. This function might unselect all previously selected columns. Returns true if the selection was successful.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] bool QAccessibleTableInterface::selectRow(int row)
db:section.db:para: Selects row. This function might unselect all previously selected rows. Returns true if the selection was successful.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] int QAccessibleTableInterface::selectedCellCount() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the total number of selected cells.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] QList<QAccessibleInterface *> QAccessibleTableInterface::selectedCells() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the list of selected cell (by their index as QAccessibleInterface::child() accepts).

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] int QAccessibleTableInterface::selectedColumnCount() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the total number of selected columns.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] QList<int> QAccessibleTableInterface::selectedColumns() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the list of currently selected columns.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] int QAccessibleTableInterface::selectedRowCount() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the total number of selected rows.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] QList<int> QAccessibleTableInterface::selectedRows() const
db:section.db:para: Returns the list of currently selected columns.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] QAccessibleInterface *QAccessibleTableInterface::summary() const
db:section.db:para: Returns a QAccessibleInterface that represents a summary of the table. This function may return 0 if no such interface exists.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] bool QAccessibleTableInterface::unselectColumn(int column)
db:section.db:para: Unselects column, leaving other selected columns selected (if any). Returns true if the selection was successful.

db:section.db:title: [pure virtual] bool QAccessibleTableInterface::unselectRow(int row)
db:section.db:para: Unselects row, leaving other selected rows selected (if any). Returns true if the selection was successful.
